A small wall shelf in walnut or cherry, ideal for a lovely bit of pottery, $2.50 each. For the Christmas breakfast a blue honey pot filled with Pi Phi honey, $1.50, or individual sorghum jugs filled with mountain sorghum molasses, 50 cents.
